name: aimms-web
description: AIMMS Web Platform - Monorepo for Frontend and Backend

scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up postgres redis backend worker frontend virtual-patient-backend virtual-patient-frontend suture-analysis-backend debrief-backend pgadmin
scripts.dev:build: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build postgres redis backend worker frontend virtual-patient-backend virtual-patient-frontend suture-analysis-backend debrief-backend pgadmin
scripts.aimms: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up postgres redis backend worker frontend pgadmin
scripts.aimms:build: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build postgres redis backend worker frontend pgadmin
scripts.virtual-patient:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --no-deps postgres redis virtual-patient-backend virtual-patient-frontend
scripts.virtual-patient:dev:build: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build --no-deps postgres redis virtual-patient-backend virtual-patient-frontend
scripts.virtual-patient:dev:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down virtual-patient-backend virtual-patient-frontend -v
scripts.suture:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up postgres backend frontend suture-analysis-backend
scripts.suture:dev:build: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build postgres backend frontend suture-analysis-backend
scripts.suture:dev:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down postgres backend frontend suture-analysis-backend -v
scripts.debrief:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up postgres backend frontend debrief-backend
scripts.debrief:dev:build: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build postgres backend frontend debrief-backend
scripts.debrief:dev:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down postgres backend frontend debrief-backend -v
scripts.prune: docker system prune -a --volumes -f && docker image prune -a -f && docker container prune -f && docker network prune -f && docker volume prune -f

author: UA-AIDSET
